attributes.value: Finds friendship burdensome
Is utterly disgusted by guile and cunning
Respects fair-dealing and fair-play
Has a great deal of respect for worthy craftsmanship
Finds the pursuit of skill mastery off-putting
Respects perseverance
Is offended by leisure time and leisurely living
Is somewhat put off by trade and commerce
Values peace over war
Can easily fall in love or develop positive sentiments
Is dour as a rule
Desires little for herself in the way of possessions
Is stubborn
Feels best when everyone gets along without any strife or contention
Is a friendly individual
Is very polite and observes appropriate rules of decorum when possible
Is pleased by her own appearance and talents
Is grateful when others help her out and tries to return favors
Is incurious and never seeks out knowledge or information to satisfy herself
Is frustratingly sloppy and careless with every task she sets to carry out
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Does not generally respond to emotional appeals
Hates vows, obligations, promises and other binding elements that could restrict her
Is trusting
Clumsy
Quick to tire
Really susceptible to disease
